author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video of Berlin, Germany 1900, Before the First World War, Berlin was a booming metropolis with a diverse and dynamic population. Its architecture was distinguished by a mix of imposing neoclassical buildings and modern industrial edifices, reflecting its central role in Germany's economic and cultural boom.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 


B&W Video Source: SV Film TV (Sweden), ushmm


Join this channel to benefit from exclusive advantages and also to support us: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1W8ShdwtfgjRHdbl1Lctcw/join
title: Berlin 1900s in color, Pre-War [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
